nodeList.loreText: The primal strength of a bear is unmatched
nodeList.nodeDescription:
Summons a primal bear that follows you into combat. The bear has high melee damage and health regen and is resistant to powerful area attacks.

The bear counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.

nodeList.description: Your Bear deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has a chance to cause enemies to bleed.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Bears have [15%] more damage per point (multiplicatibe with other modifiers)\n\nBears have [10%] additional bleed chance per point

node.loreText: The primal strength of a bear is unmatched
node.nodeDescription:
Summons a primal bear that follows you into combat. The bear has high melee damage and health regen and is resistant to powerful area attacks.

The bear counts as a companion. You can have a maximum of two companions at once by default.

nodeList.description: {Briar Thorns} cast by your Bear has a chance to deal double damage.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Bears have [20%] chance per point to deal double damage with briar thorn

node.description: Your Bear now cast {Briar Thorn,} a ranged spell that deals physical damage, and your bears have a lower retaliation threshold.
node.nodeDescription: Bears you summon cast briar thorn from range.\n\nIf you have taken the Retaliatory Thorns node on this tree, your bears now retaliate when they take 30 damage, instead of 75 damage.

node.description: Your Bear deals more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers) and has a chance to cause enemies to bleed.
node.nodeDescription: Bears have [15%] more damage per point (multiplicatibe with other modifiers)\n\nBears have [10%] additional bleed chance per point

nodeList.altText: Claw totems use melee attacks and scale with your bonuses to minions and your attunement. Claw totems do not scale with other nodes on this tree.
nodeList.description: Your Bear's kills have a chance to summon a {Claw Totem,} a totem that uses melee attacks and scales with attunement and minion stats.
nodeList.nodeDescription: When your bear kills an enemy you have a [10%] chance per point to summon a claw totem at the enemy's location.
